content.question: A ball is launched from the ground with an initial velocity of <math alttext="8.0 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>8.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math> at an angle of <math alttext="60 degrees" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>60</mn><mo>Â°</mo></math> above the horizontal. What is the approximate maximum height above the ground reached by the ball?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
